data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Nusa Tenggara Timur who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nusa Tenggara Timur, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Nusa Tenggara Timur, Indonesia.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Nusa Tenggara Timur to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Nusa Tenggara Timur.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Mbojo people.
Father, help the 25,231 believers in Nusa Tenggara Timur to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Nusa Tenggara Timur, Indonesia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Nusa Tenggara Timur, Indonesia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.
